publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-314 Helen Eadie: Scotland Celebrates the Release of Bulgarian Nurses and Palestinian Doctorâ€”That the Parliament, in solidarity with the citizens of Bulgaria, salutes all concerned in securing the release of the Bulgarian nurses and the Palestinian doctor; further applauds the lead shown by EU parliamentarians and EU external affairs commissioner, Benito Ferrero-Waldner, showing an interest having made numerous trips to Libya, meeting the prisoners and working to improve the conditions for hundreds of children with HIV/Aids, with whom great sympathy lies in their tragedy, and warmly welcomes the pardon announced by Bulgarian President Georgi Parvanov. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, Malcolm Chisholm*, John Park*
S3M-314 Scotland Celebrates the Release of Bulgarian Nurses and Palestinian Doctor (lodged on 25 July 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
